title: Compare execution times of two versions

content.question: Which of the following best compares the execution times of the two versions of the program?

choices.label: Version I requires approximately 1 more minute to execute than version II.
Version I requires approximately 5 more minutes to execute than version II.
Version II requires approximately 1 more minute to execute than version I.
Version II requires approximately 5 more minutes to execute than version I.

content.answer: Version II requires approximately 5 more minutes to execute than version I.
